Package org.optim4j.ns

Interface AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.RepairerDestroyerManager<T,​A extends Agent>

Type Parameters:
T - Partially destroyed agent type
A - Agent type
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.DefaultRepairerDestroyerManager
Enclosing class:
AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T>
public static interface AdaptiveLargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer.RepairerDestroyerManager<T,​A extends Agent>
Repairer destroyer manager for adaptive large neighborhood search.
